title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-5.1 - Needy student
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-5.1 - Needy student

State Regulations

For the purposes of subdivision 5 of Education Law, section 6405, a needy student is one who demonstrates need according to the
criteria used in the financial need analysis system which the institution uses
for purposes of the Federal student assistance program it administers under
parts A (Supplemental Education Opportunity Grant Program), C and D of title IV
of the Higher Education Act of 1965 ( Public Law
89-329
), as
amended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
